act.title: Write it Yourself!
act.intro: Use the English prompts to create four sentences using the characters below.

item.hanzi: 春节是中国人的传统节日
item.prompt: Spring Festival is the traditional festival of Chinese people.

item.hanzi: 中国的年轻人喜欢过圣诞节
item.prompt: The young people in China like celebrating Christmas.
